guttmanlab.core.annotation

Interface Annotation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MappedFragment, PopulatedWindow<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAnnotation, AvroSamRecord, BlockedAnnotation, ContiguousWindow, DerivedAnnotation, Gene, PairedMappedFragment, SAMFragment, SingleInterval

    public interface Annotation
    Author:
    prussell
